XI.i.1.A.2.b
.
Process for Receiving an Insurance Claim as a NOD
Accept any of the following forms as a NOD:
VA Form 29-4125, Claim for One Sum Payment- Government Life Insurance
, or
VA Form 29-4125a, Claim for Monthly Payments â€“ National Service Life Insurance
.
Upon receipt of the form,
process the NOD, and
forward the insurance claim to the Philadelphia VAROIC.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A  - General Policies for Veteran First Notice of Death (FNOD) Processing
citation: Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
